name: Francisco Senn
text: I always stop by purchasing some food in this place. I enjoy the speedy customer service and well prepared food. Great work.

name: Skyline Technology
text: We used to pick up a pizza here once a week, but they closed a couple months ago to focus on their Belleview location.

name: Dianna R
text: I am happy with this store. This is the best Little Caesar's I have been to hands down! They always have fresh pizzas made right. Consistency is so refreshing! Thank you!

name: Noah Escalante
text: This Lil Ceasers must be in wyoming... Because it doesn't exist

name: Leprechaun Dragon
text: For the price, how can you complain? Also this location for some reason always tastes better than other locations. Maybe because they make it fresh more often... Try a stuffed crust extra most bestest. Damn good pie for a cheap fat guy!

name: Bruce Chamberlin
text: My friend give me a hard time about eating here until they give their pizza a try. You can either grab a quick pepperoni and go, or you can get the Supreme, ( which you'll have to wait about 7mins) and the Supreme is loaded!!  No olives, which for me and the wife, is awesome. (We dislike olives!)  Delicious!

name: Sean Zhang
text: Ordered a pizaa today. Got in the store 25 minutes later to pick up. Waited in the store for another 25 minutes to finally got it. Obviously people ordered after me got their pizza ahead of me. Thankfully I asked once, otherwise I am not sure how long I'd have to wait. Don't know what happened but it is not a happy experience at all.

name: S H
text: Had to wait 15 min for Hot and ready pretzel pizza. I have never walked in there and walked out with pizza any faster then that

name: Nik Slater
text: Unless you tell them to actually fully cook it and then stand there and watch and check it, you are going to be going home with floppy, nasty, under cooked pizza. After giving them multiple chances I started going to a different one.

name: P Harris
text: Stopped in to try the Bacon crust pizza, WOW,  Got it freshly made with extra cheese, I have to say it was one of the best pizzas I've gotten in Denver. The extra cheese makes all the difference!  Got the Buffalo wings  also and they we're good as well. I will definitely be going back.  Pizza,pizza!!

name: Thomas Conrad
text: Standard fast food pizza.  Quick and easy for hungry kids if they like pepperoni.

name: Mitzy Wood
text: Used pizza portal, well tried to, finally got order 15 minutes after promised time. Lots of other people were waiting as well

name: Adam Livingston
text: Kind of like the "Jet Blue" of pizza- you get what you pay for. The girl behind the counter didn't seen terribly concerned with being cordial. The pizza was "Hot and Ready" but I didn't get what I actually ordered. Cheese and pepperoni pizzas were $5, but a mediocre vegetable pizza was $11.50.

name: Antonio Moorehead
text: Awesome customer service very friendly and accommodating.

name: Steve B
text: There was no one in there but they were still out of pepperoni pizza. Plus side of that is it was made fresh. Pretty good.

name: Jamie Patterson
text: I usually love this location, but after tonight I most likely won't return. I walked in, asked what was ready, the stuffed crust and pep. I asked for 1 of each, plus a bread. The guy said the bread was in the oven. I said I was running next …More

name: Dawn Aguirre
text: Showed up at 830 door is locked the guy inside has his whole family in there and tells me they don't have any more pizzas because hes to busy giving them to his family never seen him before but hes bald and customer service sucks I'll never …More

name: kelly fiedler
text: really nice staff quick 2

name: William Swan
text:
Busy place, appeared there was a new trainee.
Pizza was good.

name: Brendon Country
text: Walked in to get a couple of pizzas for my daughter's birthday party. Guy in the back completely ignored me and that i was even there. Stood around for 10 minutes before leaving. Worst service ever.

name: Luke S
text: Operating hours listed on website and sign on building show this location opening at 10:30am.Unfortunately I wanted bring pizza to my daughter at school so time was of the essance. Doors were locked still at 10:35am when a young female …More

name: Jessica Paszak
text:
The phone is either always off the hook, or they just let it ring and ring, so dont try to call a pizza in to pick up.
Edit July 7, Saturday. Posted time is open until 11 pm. It’s currently 1020, and there is no one on sight, doors locked. Seriously these people need a manager.

name: Travis Hendricks
text: Great price for the amount of food you get and the pizza never takes more than 4 minutes to be ready. Love it!

name: Brandon Vess
text: One of the better Little Caesars around and friendly staff

name: Wes Rulon
text: Worst pizza I've ever had from this location!!!!!! Tried calling once at home to see if they would make it right (refund, exchange, something...) but the phone line was BUSY!!??? Never again

name: Cody Fisher
text: Hit or miss as far as how well the pizza is cooked, employees are slow and have no hustle, however i can't stop going back. Takes 7 minutes usually for a hot n ready.

name: Elle Deleon
text: Ive never had an issue with this location, super friendly and super fast!

name: Nicholas Woodall
text: 9:45pm walk up for pizza hispanic lady runs up and locks door open sign is off and no pizza go else where for better service

name: Kory Hetzel
text: Loved the free cookies

name: Meghan Sands
text: I ordered a peperoni pizza. Had to wait 20 mins.... also I seen one of their employees pick up and hang up the phone 4 time when someone was trying to call... really lazy service!

name: Zachary Berger
text: Always have the best experience here!

name: Loyd Warner
text: Better then expected

name: Jim Medlock
text: This location has closed

name: Grant Wasil
text: I called two hours ahead of time to place an order so I didn't overwhelm them. When I showed up, they told me that they had lost my order, they charged me and started "making them". I came back twenty minutes later and waited for my pizza. …More

name: Dan johnson
text: Service is slow!!!! Hot n ready are never ready always atleast a 10-20 minute wait

name: Courtnie Hediger
text: Good

name: Mart Ladd
text: Horrid service. Older Hispanic make refused to make a $5.00 lunch special. Why advertise it if you won't make it?

name: Heather Finch
text: Gave us the wrong pizza.
